discussion.p: There is no specification for bad_any_cast.what.

blockquote.pre: const char* what() const noexcept override;

blockquote.p:
Returns: An implementation-defined NTBS.
Remarks: The message may be a null-terminated multibyte string (17.5.2.1.4.2), suitable for conversion and display as a wstring (21.3, 22.4.1.4).

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4618.

li.p: Insert the following series of paragraphs to as indicated:
